Use of msts for hourly (16 out of 24 hours per day) in tslm

I am new to Time series and have basic knowledge only. I am facing following problem. In following dataset “Response” is derived from “InputA/B” for 16 hours ( 8 am – 23 pm) everyday. To train I tried Msts_ Response Once above is done then use Fit Could you help in filling “?” and is the approach OK for tslm DateHours Response InputA InputB 8/1/2015 10:00 20 43 1 8/1/2015 11:00 28 43 2 8/1/2015 12:00 26 43 2 8/1/2015 13:00 35 44 3 8/1/2015 14:00 21 44 1 8/1/2015 15:00 49 44 3 8/1/2015 16:00 98 45 8 8/1/2015 17:00 33 43 3 8/1/2015 18:00 45 43 3 8/1/2015 19:00 13 42 1 8/1/2015 20:00 8 42 0 8/1/2015 21:00 12 42 1 8/1/2015 22:00 5 42 0 8/1/2015 23:00 5 42 0 8/1/2015 8:00 5 42 0 8/1/2015 9:00 6 42 0 8/2/2015 10:00 4 42 0 8/2/2015 11:00 10 42 1 8/2/2015 12:00 11 43 1 8/2/2015 13:00 11 43 1 8/2/2015 14:00 6 43 0 8/2/2015 15:00 3 42 0 8/2/2015 16:00 5 42 0 8/2/2015 17:00 4 42 0 8/2/2015 18:00 5 43 0 8/2/2015 19:00 4 43 0 8/2/2015 20:00 4 43 0 8/2/2015 21:00 3 43 0 8/2/2015 22:00 4 43 0 8/2/2015 23:00 4 43 0 8/2/2015 8:00 5 42 0 8/2/2015 9:00 4 42 0 8/3/2015 10:00 17 43 1 8/3/2015 11:00 31 44 2 8/3/2015 12:00 37 44 3 8/3/2015 13:00 33 45 2 8/3/2015 14:00 28 45 2 8/3/2015 15:00 48 45 4 8/3/2015 16:00 67 45 5 8/3/2015 17:00 48 45 4 8/3/2015 18:00 85 45 7 8/3/2015 19:00 45 44 4 8/3/2015 20:00 6 43 0 8/3/2015 21:00 4 43 0 8/3/2015 22:00 6 43 0 8/3/2015 23:00 4 43 0 8/3/2015 8:00 5 43 0 8/3/2015 9:00 8 43 0
